meanings.sent1: I need to unclutter my desk to find my pen.
meanings.sent2: She decided to unclutter her closet by donating old clothes.
meanings.sent3: Trying to unclutter a messy room is like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt uncluttered after a long walk in the park.
meanings.sent5: Uncluttering the garage made it easier to park the car.

meanings.definition: Make (something) neat and organized by removing unnecessary items
meanings.sent1: The maid will unclutter the living room before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: He uncluttered his computer desktop by deleting old files.
meanings.sent3: Uncluttering the kitchen cabinets revealed long-lost cookware.
meanings.sent4: Her words uncluttered the confusion in his mind.
meanings.sent5: Uncluttering the bookshelves made the room feel more spacious.
